segments.source_content: # Search

translations.zh-CN: # 搜索

segments.source_content: There are a few options you can use to add search to your website:

translations.zh-CN: 您可以通过以下几种方式为网站添加搜索功能：

segments.source_content:
- 🥇 [Algolia DocSearch](#using-algolia-docsearch) (**official**)
- 👥 [Typesense DocSearch](#using-typesense-docsearch)
- 👥 [Local Search](#using-local-search)
- 👥 [Your own `SearchBar` component](#using-your-own-search)

translations.zh-CN:
- 🥇 [Algolia DocSearch](#using-algolia-docsearch)（**官方支持**）
- 👥 [Typesense DocSearch](#using-typesense-docsearch)
- 👥 [本地搜索](#using-local-search)
- 👥 [自定义`SearchBar`组件](#using-your-own-search)

segments.source_content:
:::info

🥇 Docusaurus provides **first-class support** for [Algolia DocSearch](#using-algolia-docsearch).

👥 Other options are **maintained by the community**: please report bugs to their respective repositories.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info

🥇 Docusaurus 为 [Algolia DocSearch](#using-algolia-docsearch) 提供**一等支持**。

👥 其他选项由**社区维护**：相关问题请提交至各自代码仓库。

:::

segments.source_content: ## 🥇 Using Algolia DocSearch {#using-algolia-docsearch}

translations.zh-CN: ## 🥇 使用 Algolia DocSearch {#using-algolia-docsearch}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus has **official support** for [Algolia DocSearch](https://docsearch.algolia.com).

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus **官方支持** [Algolia DocSearch](https://docsearch.algolia.com) 服务。

segments.source_content: The service is **free** for any developer documentation or technical blog: just make sure to read the [checklist](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/who-can-apply/) and [apply to the DocSearch program](https://docsearch.algolia.com/apply).

translations.zh-CN: 该服务对开发者文档和技术博客**完全免费**：只需阅读[准入清单](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/who-can-apply/)并[申请加入DocSearch计划](https://docsearch.algolia.com/apply)。

segments.source_content: DocSearch crawls your website once a week (the schedule is configurable from the web interface) and aggregates all the content in an Algolia index. This content is then queried directly from your front-end using the Algolia API.

translations.zh-CN: DocSearch会每周抓取您的网站（可通过网页界面配置周期），将所有内容聚合到Algolia索引中。这些内容随后通过Algolia API从前端直接查询。

segments.source_content: If your website is [not eligible](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/who-can-apply) for the free, hosted version of DocSearch, or if your website sits behind a firewall and is not public, then you can [run your own](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/run-your-own/) DocSearch crawler.

translations.zh-CN: 如果您的网站[不符合](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/who-can-apply)免费托管版DocSearch的条件，或网站部署在防火墙后非公开访问，您可以[自行运行](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/run-your-own/)DocSearch爬虫。

segments.source_content:
:::note

By default, the Docusaurus preset generates a [sitemap.xml](https://docusaurus.io/sitemap.xml) that the Algolia crawler can use.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::note

默认情况下，Docusaurus预设会生成可供Algolia爬虫使用的[sitemap.xml](https://docusaurus.io/sitemap.xml)。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::info[From the old docsearch?]

You can read more about migration from the legacy DocSearch infra in [our blog post](/blog/2021/11/21/algolia-docsearch-migration) or [the DocSearch migration docs](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/migrating-from-legacy).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info[从旧版docsearch迁移？]

您可以通过[我们的博客文章](/blog/2021/11/21/algolia-docsearch-migration)或[DocSearch迁移文档](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/migrating-from-legacy)了解从旧版基础设施迁移的更多信息。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Index Configuration {#algolia-index-configuration}

translations.zh-CN: ### 索引配置 {#algolia-index-configuration}

segments.source_content: After your application has been approved and deployed, you will receive an email with all the details for you to add DocSearch to your project. Editing and managing your crawls can be done via [the web interface](https://crawler.algolia.com/). Indices are readily available after deployment, so manual configuration usually isn't necessary.

translations.zh-CN: 申请通过并部署后，您将收到包含项目接入DocSearch所有详情的邮件。可通过[网页界面](https://crawler.algolia.com/)编辑和管理爬取任务。索引在部署后立即可用，通常无需手动配置。

segments.source_content:
:::danger[Use the recommended crawler config]

It is highly recommended to use our official [**Docusaurus v3 crawler configuration**](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/templates/#docusaurus-v3-template). We cannot support you if you choose a different crawler configuration.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::danger[使用推荐的爬虫配置]

强烈建议使用我们官方的[**Docusaurus v3爬虫配置模板**](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/templates/#docusaurus-v3-template)。若选择其他爬虫配置，我们将无法提供支持。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::warning[When updating your crawler config]

The crawler configuration contains a `initialIndexSettings`, which will only be used to initialize your Algolia index if it does not exist yet.

If you update your `initialIndexSettings` crawler setting, it is possible to update the index manually through the interface, but [the Algolia team recommends to delete your index and then restart a crawl](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/9200#issuecomment-1667338492) to fully reinitialize it with the new settings.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning[更新爬虫配置时]

爬虫配置中的`initialIndexSettings`仅用于初始化尚未存在的Algolia索引。

若更新`initialIndexSettings`爬虫配置，虽然可通过界面手动更新索引，但[Algolia团队建议删除索引后重新爬取](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/9200#issuecomment-1667338492)，以全新初始化新配置。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Connecting Algolia {#connecting-algolia}

translations.zh-CN: ### 接入Algolia {#connecting-algolia}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus' own `@docusaurus/preset-classic` supports Algolia DocSearch integration. If you use the classic preset, no additional installation is needed.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus自带的`@docusaurus/preset-classic`已支持Algolia DocSearch集成。若使用经典预设，无需额外安装。

segments.source_content: Installation steps when not using @docusaurus/preset-classic 1. Install the package: ```bash npm2yarn npm install --save @docusaurus/theme-search-algolia ``` 2. Register the theme in `docusaurus.config.js`: ```js title="docusaurus.config.js" export default { title: 'My site', // ... themes: ['@docusaurus/theme-search-algolia'], themeConfig: { // ... }, }; ```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_c537a3d3

segments.source_content: Then, add an `algolia` field in your `themeConfig`. **[Apply for DocSearch](https://docsearch.algolia.com/apply/)** to get your Algolia index and API key.

translations.zh-CN: 然后在`themeConfig`中添加`algolia`字段。**[申请DocSearch](https://docsearch.algolia.com/apply/)**以获取Algolia索引和API密钥。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_daa16011

segments.source_content:
:::info

The `searchParameters` option used to be named `algoliaOptions` in Docusaurus v1.

Refer to its [official DocSearch documentation](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/api#searchparameters) for possible values.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info

在 Docusaurus v1 中，`searchParameters` 选项曾命名为 `algoliaOptions`。

具体可用参数请参阅 [官方 DocSearch 文档](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/api#searchparameters)。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::warning

The search feature will not work reliably until Algolia crawls your site.

If search doesn't work after any significant change, please use the Algolia dashboard to **trigger a new crawl**.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning

搜索功能在 Algolia 爬虫完成站点抓取前无法可靠工作。

若重大更新后搜索失效，请通过 Algolia 控制台**手动触发重新抓取**。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Contextual search {#contextual-search}

translations.zh-CN: ### 上下文搜索 {#contextual-search}

segments.source_content: Contextual search is **enabled by default**.

translations.zh-CN: 上下文搜索功能**默认启用**。

segments.source_content: It ensures that search results are **relevant to the current language and version**.

translations.zh-CN: 该功能可确保搜索结果**始终匹配当前语言与版本**。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_e9921a93

segments.source_content: Let's consider you have 2 docs versions (**v1** and **v2**) and 2 languages (`en` and `fr`).

translations.zh-CN: 假设您的文档存在两个版本（**v1** 和 **v2**）和两种语言（`en` 与 `fr`）。

segments.source_content: When browsing v2 docs, it would be odd to return search results for the v1 documentation. Sometimes v1 and v2 docs are quite similar, and you would end up with duplicate search results for the same query (one result per version).

translations.zh-CN: 当浏览 v2 文档时，若返回 v1 版本的搜索结果会显得不合逻辑。由于不同版本文档内容可能高度相似，这将导致同一查询返回重复结果（每个版本各出现一次）。

segments.source_content: Similarly, when browsing the French site, it would be odd to return search results for the English docs.

translations.zh-CN: 同理，在法语站点浏览时返回英文文档结果也不符合预期。

segments.source_content: To solve this problem, the contextual search feature understands that you are browsing a specific docs version and language, and will create the search query filters dynamically.

translations.zh-CN: 上下文搜索功能通过动态创建搜索查询过滤器，确保结果始终匹配当前浏览的文档版本和语言。

segments.source_content:
- on `/en/docs/v1/myDoc`, search results will only include **English** results for the **v1** docs (+ other unversioned pages)
- on `/fr/docs/v2/myDoc`, search results will only include **French** results for the **v2** docs (+ other unversioned pages)

translations.zh-CN:
- 在 `/en/docs/v1/myDoc` 页面，搜索结果仅包含 **v1 版本英文文档**（及未版本化的页面）
- 在 `/fr/docs/v2/myDoc` 页面，搜索结果仅包含 **v2 版本法语文档**（及未版本化的页面）

segments.source_content:
:::warning[Contextual search doesn't work?]

If you only get search results when Contextual Search is disabled, this is very likely because of an [index configuration issue](#algolia-no-search-results).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning[上下文搜索失效？]

若仅在禁用上下文搜索时才能获取结果，通常是由于[索引配置问题](#algolia-no-search-results)导致。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Styling your Algolia search {#styling-your-algolia-search}

translations.zh-CN: ### 定制 Algolia 搜索样式 {#styling-your-algolia-search}

segments.source_content: By default, DocSearch comes with a fine-tuned theme that was designed for accessibility, making sure that colors and contrasts respect standards.

translations.zh-CN: DocSearch 默认采用符合无障碍标准的精心调校主题，确保色彩与对比度达到规范要求。

segments.source_content: Still, you can reuse the [Infima CSS variables](styling-layout.mdx#styling-your-site-with-infima) from Docusaurus to style DocSearch by editing the `/src/css/custom.css` file.

translations.zh-CN: 您仍可通过修改 `/src/css/custom.css` 文件，使用 Docusaurus 的 [Infima CSS 变量](styling-layout.mdx#styling-your-site-with-infima)来定制样式。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_93bf74a6

segments.source_content: ### Customizing the Algolia search behavior {#customizing-the-algolia-search-behavior}

translations.zh-CN: ### 自定义 Algolia 搜索行为 {#customizing-the-algolia-search-behavior}

segments.source_content: Algolia DocSearch supports a [list of options](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/api/) that you can pass to the `algolia` field in the `docusaurus.config.js` file.

translations.zh-CN: Algolia DocSearch 支持通过 `docusaurus.config.js` 文件中的 `algolia` 字段传递[配置参数](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/api/)。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_b1274b5e

segments.source_content: ### Editing the Algolia search component {#editing-the-algolia-search-component}

translations.zh-CN: ### 修改 Algolia 搜索组件 {#editing-the-algolia-search-component}

segments.source_content: If you prefer to edit the Algolia search React component, [swizzle](swizzling.mdx) the `SearchBar` component in `@docusaurus/theme-search-algolia`:

translations.zh-CN: 如需直接修改 Algolia 搜索的 React 组件，可通过[置换](swizzling.mdx) `@docusaurus/theme-search-algolia` 中的 `SearchBar` 组件实现：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run swizzle @docusaurus/theme-search-algolia SearchBar
```

segments.source_content: ### Troubleshooting {#algolia-troubleshooting}

translations.zh-CN: ### 故障排查 {#algolia-troubleshooting}

segments.source_content: Here are the most common issues Docusaurus users face when using Algolia DocSearch.

translations.zh-CN: 以下是 Docusaurus 用户在使用 Algolia DocSearch 时最常遇到的问题。

segments.source_content: #### No Search Results {#algolia-no-search-results}

translations.zh-CN: #### 无搜索结果 {#algolia-no-search-results}

segments.source_content: Seeing no search results is usually related to an **index configuration problem**.

translations.zh-CN: 出现无搜索结果的情况通常与**索引配置问题**相关。

segments.source_content:
<details>
  <summary>How to check if I have a config problem?</summary>

Docusaurus uses [Algolia faceting](https://www.algolia.com/doc/guides/managing-results/refine-results/faceting/) for its [Contextual Search](#contextual-search) feature, to create dynamic queries such as:

```json
[
  "language:en",
  [
    "docusaurus_tag:default",
    "docusaurus_tag:docs-default-3.2.1",
    "docusaurus_tag:docs-community-current",
    "docusaurus_tag:docs-docs-tests-current"
  ]
]
```

On the Algolia UI, your index should allow to create facet queries on fields `docusaurus_tag`, `language`, `lang`, `version`, `type`, as shown in the screenshot below:

![Algolia index showing appropriate faceting fields](/img/docsearch-troubleshoot-index-facets.jpg)

Alternatively, if you disable [Contextual Search](#contextual-search) with `{contextualSearch: false}` (which we don't particularly recommend), Docusaurus will not use facet queries, and you should start seeing results.

</details>

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_bcbf4b27

segments.source_content:
:::danger[Use the recommended configuration]

We [recommend a specific crawler configuration](#algolia-index-configuration) for a good reason. We cannot support you if you choose to use a different configuration.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::danger[使用推荐配置]

我们[推荐特定的爬虫配置](#algolia-index-configuration)是有充分理由的。如果您选择使用不同配置，我们将无法提供支持。

:::

segments.source_content: You can fix index configuration problems by following those steps:

translations.zh-CN: 您可以通过以下步骤修复索引配置问题：

segments.source_content:
1. Use the [recommend crawler configuration](#algolia-index-configuration)
2. Delete your index through the UI
3. Trigger a new crawl through the UI
4. Check your index is recreated with the appropriate faceting fields: `docusaurus_tag`, `language`, `lang`, `version`, `type`
5. See that you now get search results, even with [Contextual Search](#contextual-search) enabled

translations.zh-CN:
1. 使用[推荐的爬虫配置](#algolia-index-configuration)
2. 通过界面删除现有索引
3. 通过界面触发重新爬取
4. 检查索引是否重建了正确的分面字段：`docusaurus_tag`、`language`、`lang`、`version`、`type`
5. 确认现在能获取搜索结果（即使启用了[上下文搜索](#contextual-search)）

segments.source_content: ### Support {#algolia-support}

translations.zh-CN: ### 支持 {#algolia-support}

segments.source_content: The Algolia DocSearch team can help you figure out search problems on your site.

translations.zh-CN: Algolia DocSearch 团队可协助排查您站点的搜索问题。

segments.source_content: You can reach out to Algolia via [their support page](https://algolia.com/support) or on [Discord](https://discord.gg/wr2m5j948P).

translations.zh-CN: 您可通过[Algolia支持页面](https://algolia.com/support)或[Discord](https://discord.gg/wr2m5j948P)联系他们。

segments.source_content: Docusaurus also has an `#algolia` channel on [Discord](https://discordapp.com/invite/docusaurus).

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus在[Discord](https://discordapp.com/invite/docusaurus)也设有`#algolia`频道。

segments.source_content: ## 👥 Using Typesense DocSearch {#using-typesense-docsearch}

translations.zh-CN: ## 👥 使用Typesense DocSearch {#using-typesense-docsearch}

segments.source_content: [Typesense](https://typesense.org) DocSearch works similar to Algolia DocSearch, except that your website is indexed into a Typesense search cluster.

translations.zh-CN: [Typesense](https://typesense.org) DocSearch与Algolia DocSearch工作原理相似，区别在于您的网站内容会被索引到Typesense搜索集群中。

segments.source_content: Typesense is an [open source](https://github.com/typesense/typesense) instant-search engine that you can either:

translations.zh-CN: Typesense是一个[开源](https://github.com/typesense/typesense)即时搜索引擎，您可以选择：

segments.source_content:
- [Self-Host](https://typesense.org/docs/guide/install-typesense.html#option-2-local-machine-self-hosting) on your own servers or
- Use the Managed [Typesense Cloud](https://cloud.typesense.org) service.

translations.zh-CN:
- 在自有服务器上[自主托管](https://typesense.org/docs/guide/install-typesense.html#option-2-local-machine-self-hosting)
- 或使用托管的[Typesense Cloud](https://cloud.typesense.org)服务

segments.source_content: Similar to Algolia DocSearch, there are two components:

translations.zh-CN: 与Algolia DocSearch类似，包含两个组件：

segments.source_content:
- [typesense-docsearch-scraper](https://github.com/typesense/typesense-docsearch-scraper) - which scrapes your website and indexes the data in your Typesense cluster.
- [docusaurus-theme-search-typesense](https://github.com/typesense/docusaurus-theme-search-typesense) - a search bar UI component to add to your website.

translations.zh-CN:
- [typesense-docsearch-scraper](https://github.com/typesense/typesense-docsearch-scraper) - 用于抓取网站内容并将数据索引到Typesense集群
- [docusaurus-theme-search-typesense](https://github.com/typesense/docusaurus-theme-search-typesense) - 可集成到网站的搜索栏UI组件

segments.source_content: Read a step-by-step walk-through of how to [run typesense-docsearch-scraper here](https://typesense.org/docs/guide/docsearch.html#step-1-set-up-docsearch-scraper) and how to [install the Search Bar in your Docusaurus Site here](https://typesense.org/docs/guide/docsearch.html#option-a-docusaurus-powered-sites).

translations.zh-CN: 请参阅[运行typesense-docsearch-scraper的逐步指南](https://typesense.org/docs/guide/docsearch.html#step-1-set-up-docsearch-scraper)以及[在Docusaurus站点安装搜索栏的说明](https://typesense.org/docs/guide/docsearch.html#option-a-docusaurus-powered-sites)。

segments.source_content: ## 👥 Using Local Search {#using-local-search}

translations.zh-CN: ## 👥 使用本地搜索 {#using-local-search}

segments.source_content: You can use a local search plugin for websites where the search index is small and can be downloaded to your users' browsers when they visit your website.

translations.zh-CN: 对于搜索索引较小且可随网站加载到用户浏览器的情况，可使用本地搜索插件。

segments.source_content: You'll find a list of community-supported [local search plugins listed here](https://docusaurus.io/community/resources#search).

translations.zh-CN: 社区支持的[本地搜索插件列表可在此查看](https://docusaurus.io/community/resources#search)。

segments.source_content: ## 👥 Using your own search {#using-your-own-search}

translations.zh-CN: ## 👥 使用自定义搜索 {#using-your-own-search}

segments.source_content: To use your own search, swizzle the `SearchBar` component in `@docusaurus/theme-classic`

translations.zh-CN: 要使用自定义搜索，请置换`@docusaurus/theme-classic`中的`SearchBar`组件

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run swizzle @docusaurus/theme-classic SearchBar
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_049ef044

segments.source_content: This will create an `src/theme/SearchBar` file in your project folder. Restart your dev server and edit the component, you will see that Docusaurus uses your own `SearchBar` component now.

translations.zh-CN: 这将在项目文件夹中创建`src/theme/SearchBar`文件。重启开发服务器并编辑该组件，您会发现Docusaurus现在使用您的自定义`SearchBar`组件。

segments.source_content: **Notes**: You can alternatively [swizzle from Algolia SearchBar](#editing-the-algolia-search-component) and create your own search component from there.

translations.zh-CN: **注意**：您也可以[从Algolia SearchBar开始置换](#editing-the-algolia-search-component)，并基于此创建自定义搜索组件。
